decode.doc:
Decodes a given base64 string

Parameters:
 * str - A base64 encoded string

Returns:
 * A string containing the decoded data
decode.name: decode
returns: * A string containing the decoded data

encode.desc: Encodes a given string to base64
encode.doc:
Encodes a given string to base64

Parameters:
 * val - A string to encode as base64
 * width - Optional line width to split the string into (usually 64 or 76)

Returns:
 * A string containing the base64 representation of the input string
encode.name: encode
parameters: * val - A string to encode as base64
* width - Optional line width to split the string into (usually 64 or 76)
returns: * A string containing the base64 representation of the input string
